sheets.name: Throndir
sheets.description: An Elf given a Dwarven name at birth. He has huge muscles and long red hair. There must have been a mix-up.

stunts.title: Fire Blast
stunts.description: You can shoot or exhale fire. Whenever you succeed with style on a Forceful attack, you may forgo the boost to place an On Fire aspect with a free invoke on the defender or a nearby object. This effect only works if the target could believably catch fire. In addition, you can never become Unarmed.

stunts.title: Poisoned Weapon
stunts.description: You use a poisoned weapon such as dagger, arrows, or darts. Once per scene, when you Sneakily or Quickly attack and deal 2 stress or more, you can force the defender to absorb 2 stress from your attack as a mild consequence. Some targets—robots, inanimate objects, and so on—are immune to poison.

stunts.title: Strong Legs
stunts.description: You have powerful legs that are especially suited for running or jumping. During contests and cliffhangers, +2 when Quickly over-coming physical obstacles or creating advantages.

sheets.name: Harry Dresden
sheets.description: He bears the mantle of a Knight of a Faerie Court. He operates at Otherworldy scale.

aspects.title: Cold hands, warm heart, wise ass

sheets.name: Sarissa, The Summer Lady
sheets.description: Her scale is Otherworldy.

stunts.title: Glamour
stunts.description: You may cast minor veils and seemings. Use Intellect to resist any disbelief attempt.

stunts.title: The Lady's Seelie Magic
stunts.description: Sarissa may cast evocations that fit the nature of Summer: growth, abundance, vigor, fire.

stunts.title: Seelie Rituals
stunts.description: When performing ritual magic that thematically fits within Summe, Sarissa gets +2 to her preparation roll and can use members of her Court to fulfill one cost. Rituals performed for or on player characters may still have a cost in the form of a drawback or specific casting requirement that the PCs must fulfill.

stunts.title: True Fae
stunts.description: Once per scene, Sarissa may temporarily access any of the general or Summer stunts from the True Fae mantle. This stunt remains in effect as long as Sarissa wishes it or until the end of the scene.

sheets.name: SF-46 D "Blackfish" Starfighter
sheets.description:
Well Armed: Gain Weapon:1 to Gunnery attacks.
Automated Ejection System: see page 46

sheets.name: Geronimo
sheets.description: A mundane human who constantly finds himself at the center of mysteries involving horror and the occult.

Once per scene, when you Sneakily or Quickly attack and deal 2 stress or more, you can force the defender to absorb 2 stress from your attack as a mild consequence. Some targets—robots, inanimate objects, and so on—are immune to poison.

stunts.title: Strong Legs
stunts.description: You have powerful legs that are especially suited for running or jumping. During contests and cliffhangers, +2 when Quickly over-coming physical obstacles or creating advantages.

sheets.name: Geronimo the Classy
sheets.description: A mundane human who constantly finds himself at the center of mysteries involving horror and the occult.

stunts.title: Fire Blast
stunts.description: You can shoot or exhale fire. Whenever you succeed with style on a Forceful attack, you may forgo the boost to place an On Fire aspect with a free invoke on the defender or a nearby object. This effect only works if the target could believably catch fire. In addition, you can never become Unarmed.

sheets.name: Harry Dresden
sheets.description: He bears the mantle of a Knight of a Faerie Court. He operates at Otherworldy scale.

aspects.title: Cold hands, warm heart, wise ass

sheets.name: Sarissa, The Summer Lady
sheets.description: Her scale is Otherworldy.

stunts.title: Glamour
stunts.description: You may cast minor veils and seemings. Use Intellect to resist any disbelief attempt.

stunts.title: The Lady's Seelie Magic
stunts.description: Sarissa may cast evocations that fit the nature of Summer: growth, abundance, vigor, fire.

stunts.title: Seelie Rituals
stunts.description: When performing ritual magic that thematically fits within Summe, Sarissa gets +2 to her preparation roll and can use members of her Court to fulfill one cost. Rituals performed for or on player characters may still have a cost in the form of a drawback or specific casting requirement that the PCs must fulfill.

stunts.title: True Fae
stunts.description: Once per scene, Sarissa may temporarily access any of the general or Summer stunts from the True Fae mantle. This stunt remains in effect as long as Sarissa wishes it or until the end of the scene.

This effect only works if the target could believably catch fire. In addition, you can never become Unarmed.

stunts.title: Poisoned Weapon
stunts.description: You use a poisoned weapon such as dagger, arrows, or darts. Once per scene, when you Sneakily or Quickly attack and deal 2 stress or more, you can force the defender to absorb 2 stress from your attack as a mild consequence. Some targets—robots, inanimate objects, and so on—are immune to poison.

stunts.title: Strong Legs
stunts.description: You have powerful legs that are especially suited for running or jumping. During contests and cliffhangers, +2 when Quickly over-coming physical obstacles or creating advantages.

stunts.title: Fire Blast
stunts.description: You can shoot or exhale fire. Whenever you succeed with style on a Forceful attack, you may forgo the boost to place an On Fire aspect with a free invoke on the defender or a nearby object. This effect only works if the target could believably catch fire. In addition, you can never become Unarmed.

stunts.title: Poisoned Weapon
stunts.description: You use a poisoned weapon such as dagger, arrows, or darts. Once per scene, when you Sneakily or Quickly attack and deal 2 stress or more, you can force the defender to absorb 2 stress from your attack as a mild consequence. Some targets—robots, inanimate objects, and so on—are immune to poison.

stunts.title: Strong Legs
stunts.description: You have powerful legs that are especially suited for running or jumping. During contests and cliffhangers, +2 when Quickly over-coming physical obstacles or creating advantages.

sheets.name: Harry Dresden
sheets.description: He bears the mantle of a Knight of a Faerie Court. He operates at Otherworldy scale.

aspects.title: Cold hands, warm heart, wise ass

sheets.name: Sarissa, The Summer Lady
sheets.description: Her scale is Otherworldy.

stunts.title: Glamour
stunts.description: You may cast minor veils and seemings. Use Intellect to resist any disbelief attempt.

stunts.title: The Lady's Seelie Magic
stunts.description: Sarissa may cast evocations that fit the nature of Summer: growth, abundance, vigor, fire.

stunts.title: Seelie Rituals
stunts.description: When performing ritual magic that thematically fits within Summe, Sarissa gets +2 to her preparation roll and can use members of her Court to fulfill one cost. Rituals performed for or on player characters may still have a cost in the form of a drawback or specific casting requirement that the PCs must fulfill.

stunts.title: True Fae
stunts.description: Once per scene, Sarissa may temporarily access any of the general or Summer stunts from the True Fae mantle. This stunt remains in effect as long as Sarissa wishes it or until the end of the scene.

sheets.name: SF-46 D "Blackfish" Starfighter
sheets.description:
Well Armed: Gain Weapon:1 to Gunnery attacks.
